Machine_Doors

Contains logic pertaining to ML10 machine doors.

Functions
OpenDoor
call Machine_Doors.OpenDoor();

Command the front door to open

CloseDoor
call Machine_Doors.CloseDoor();

Command the front door to close

IsClosed
call Machine_Doors.IsClosed(
&doorClosed
);

Test the state of the door

Response Parameters
&doorClosed

If the door is currently closed, 0.  If not closed, 1.
